Made with privacy in mind

5ENPAI is a consultant service in which we give users the privacy of purchasing products, without the thought of knowing your purchases are being tracked back to you by marketers in Amazon. While you shop using 5ENPAI, you'll have the power of Prime without the commitment of the subscription

Privacy

Shop with the peace of mind knowing you are not being targeted with products based off past purchases!

Economic

5ENPAI makes online shopping economical to use instead of paying expensive memberships to your favorite stores websites.

Flexible

Want to use crypto to pay? No problem! We support purchases made with Bitcoin.
